subdisciplines.name: Drawing
subdisciplines.description: The art or technique of producing images on a surface, usually paper, by means of marks, usually of ink, graphite, or chalk.

subdisciplines.name: Oil Painting
subdisciplines.description: A technique in which pigments with a medium of drying oil as the binder are applied to a prepared surface.

subdisciplines.name: Watercolor Painting
subdisciplines.description: A painting method in which the paints are made of pigments suspended in a water-soluble medium.
